short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Improve reading experience and speed by adapting on-screen text formatting to your personal unique reading preferences.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A new way of reading
 
Did you know that you could increase your reading speed by 30%? Scientific research has shown that your reading speed depends heavily on the fonts and colours you use. We first test your optimal font settings, then we optimize the fonts on your screen.
 
With Teggl, you will have more time and energy for the things you love.
